Using both Kurama and Sage Modes, Naruto forms a Giant Rasengan and Tobirama teleports him above the opponent to strike them down.

== Trivia ==
* In the manga and anime, Naruto and Tobirama used a lesser version of this combination, with Naruto only using Sage Mode and the regular sized Rasengan.
